statements: SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, employee_id, last_access_timestamp FROM authorized_devices;
SELECT employee_id, device_name, device_type, device_id, last_access_timestamp FROM authorized_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type, employee_id, device_id, last_access_timestamp FROM authorized_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, last_access_timestamp, employee_id, device_type FROM authorized_devices;
SELECT * FROM authorized_devices;
SELECT * FROM authorized_devices ORDER BY last_access_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, employee_id FROM authorized_devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT device_id, device_name, employee_id, last_access_timestamp FROM authorized_devices WHERE device_type = 'Laptop' AND employee_id = 1024;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM authorized_devices WHERE employee_id IN (1001, 1002, 1003) ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT device_type FROM authorized_devices;
SELECT * FROM authorized_devices WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_name, device_model FROM authorized_devices WHERE device_model = 'Model X';
SELECT device_id, authorization_date FROM authorized_devices WHERE device_name LIKE '%iPhone%';
SELECT * FROM authorized_devices ORDER BY authorization_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, accessed_resource FROM access_logs WHERE access_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM authorized_devices WHERE device_name = 'iPhone'
SELECT device_id, user_id, authorization_date FROM authorized_devices WHERE device_model = 'Samsung Galaxy'
SELECT device_name, device_model FROM authorized_devices WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM authorized_devices WHERE authorization_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT device_name, authorization_date FROM authorized_devices ORDER BY authorization_date DESC
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Phone';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE id = 1;
SELECT device_name, user_id FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(device_id) AS device_count FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(device_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT users.username, devices.device_name, access_logs.access_time FROM users JOIN access_logs ON users.user_id = access_logs.user_id JOIN devices ON devices.id = access_logs.device_id;
SELECT devices.device_name, access_logs.access_time FROM devices JOIN access_logs ON devices.id = access_logs.device_id ORDER BY access_logs.access_time DESC;

SELECT users.username, devices.device_name, access_logs.access_time FROM users JOIN access_logs ON users.user_id = access_logs.user_id JOIN devices ON devices.id = access_logs.device_id WHERE access_logs.access_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, last_login FROM devices;
SELECT department_name FROM departments;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, email FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT device_name, employee_name, department FROM devices d JOIN employees e ON d.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE d.last_login > '2022-01-01' AND e.department = 'IT';
SELECT device_name, employee_name, login_time, logout_time FROM devices d JOIN access_logs al ON d.device_id = al.device_id WHERE al.login_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY al.login_time DESC;
SELECT e.employee_name, d.device_name, d.last_login FROM devices d JOIN employees e ON d.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE d.device_name LIKE '%Laptop%' AND e.department <> 'HR';

SELECT department_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS employee_count FROM departments d JOIN employees e ON d.department_id = e.department WHERE e.employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT * FROM authorized_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM authorized_devices WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT device_name, last_checked FROM authorized_devices WHERE last_checked > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM access_logs JOIN employees ON access_logs.employee_id = employees.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='IT';
SELECT device_name, last_checked FROM authorized_devices WHERE is_active=true ORDER BY last_checked DESC;
SELECT employee_name, email FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.employee_id = departments.manager_id WHERE department_name='HR';
SELECT employee_name, device_name FROM employees JOIN access_logs ON employees.employee_id = access_logs.employee_id JOIN authorized_devices ON authorized_devices.device_id = access_logs.device_id;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE accessed_at >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND accessed_at <= '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
